Tricorder-RaspberryPi

plotting_functions module

Contains matplotlib-derived functions used for graphiing.

plotting_functions.bar_plot(fig, ax, canvas, x_labels, color_list, curr_vals, ylabel='')

Makes bar plot

Parameters

  • fig – Required for converting plot to surface.

  • ax – Matplotlib axis to be used for plotting.

  • canvas – Pygame canvas to be returned as surface.

  • color_list – Colors for different series.

  • curr_vals – Values for making bar plot.

  • ylabel – Y-axis labels.

Returns

Pygame surface with bar plot.

plotting_functions.line_plot(fig, ax, canvas, color_list, x_array, array_dict)

Makes line plot for one or more data series.

Parameters

  • fig – Required for converting plot to surface.

  • ax – Matplotlib axis to be used for plotting.

  • canvas – Pygame canvas to be returned as surface.

  • color_list – Colors for different series.

  • x_array – Data to be plotted for a specific series.

  • array_dict – For use with multiple data series.

Returns

Pygame surface with line plot.

plotting_functions.pie_plot(fig, ax, canvas, color_list, pie_labels, curr_vals)

Makes pie plot

Parameters

  • fig – Required for converting plot to surface.

  • ax – Matplotlib axis to be used for plotting.

  • canvas – Pygame canvas to be returned as surface.

  • color_list – Colors for different series.

  • pie_labels – Labels for each series.

  • curr_vals – Vals for plotting pie chart.

Returns

Pygame surface with pie plot.

plotting_functions.plot2img(fig, ax, canvas)

Converts matplotlib plot to image. Sets BG colorkey to BLACK for transparent surface.

Returns

Pygame surface.
